title:
Why is New Hanover County allowing these huge electronic bill boards signs to be erected throughout the city?  Also,I thought there were plans to beautify Market Street.  Do you know the status of this?

Thank you!
text:
Here are a couple of links that should answer your question
about billboards.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9046



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8042



There's been no mention of plans to beautify Market Street, though
there are plans to repave it:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12044
